game.description: Retrieve the ancient artifact from the long-abandoned temple.
game.objective: Retrieve the Starlight Crystal, a powerful relic rumored to grant immense magical power.
game.quest_giver: Eryndor Thorne, the village elder of Brindlemark
game.reward: 1000 gold pieces and the gratitude of Eryndor Thorne

tasks.description: Speak with the village historian about the temple's secrets.
tasks.objective: Gather information about the temple's layout and potential dangers.

tasks.description: Retrieve the map to the temple from a local adventurer.
tasks.location: A small inn in the nearby town of Oakwood
tasks.objective: Obtain the map, which is currently in the possession of the adventurer.

tasks.description: Explore the temple and navigate its deadly traps.
tasks.objective: Reach the inner sanctum where the Starlight Crystal is said to reside.

game.title: The Lost Temple of Eldarath
